quizzes.question: Fill in the blank to reduce the element to 20% of its original size.
When adding multiple transformations in a single transform property, separate them with ...
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Multiple Transforms[/h1]

Multiple transforms can be used at once. Rotating and scaling the size of an element at the same time is an example of that.
Applying multiple transforms to an element is simple; just separate them using [b]spaces[/b].

Here's an example with two transforms defined: [code format="css" codeId="629"]transform: rotate(45deg) translate(100px);[/code]
[b]Result:[/b] [img id="2714" width="100%"]
[note]If you use [b]commas[/b] to separate the functions, none of the functions will be applied, so keep in mind not to use commas.[/note]
